resources.string: "Take a look at my other apps"
"Please feel free to contact me for any feedback, feature request or bug report. "
"This software is provided 'as-is', without any express or implied warranty. In no event will the author be held liable for any damages arising from the use of this software."
"All icons for this app were created and belong to the author of the app : Xavier Gouchet (android@xgouchet.fr)."

"This application is completely free to use, and doesn't bother you with ads. I try my best to make it as good as possible, but only do this on my free time. If you want to support my work, you can click the Donate button below."
